sentences.en: Anna translated it, as it were , into Marion's normal voice.
sentences.cn: 安娜把这问话还原成玛丽恩的清醒的语调.

sentences.en: At least Marion has greater potential to reduce the injury factor.
sentences.cn: 至少马里昂更有减少伤病因素的能力.

sentences.en: Back home, Jones is made an associate dean and marries Marion.
sentences.cn: 回到家里, 琼斯是作出了副院长及结婚马里昂.

sentences.en: He greeted Marion with his voice pitched carefully to avoid either feigned enthusiasm or dislike.
sentences.cn: 他用既不伪装热情,又不表示嫌恶的谨慎语调问候马丽恩.

sentences.en: He knew that the beautiful Maid Marion would be there.
sentences.cn: 他知道美丽的少女梅德·玛丽安会在那里.

sentences.en: Marion berated Joe for the noise he made.
sentences.cn: 玛丽昂严厉斥责乔吵吵闹闹。

sentences.en: Marion Clark's having a baby so she'll be leaving in a few months.
sentences.cn: 玛丽恩?克拉克怀孕了,还有几个月就要走的.

sentences.en: Marion had just been to see me, and had a prior claim so to speak.
sentences.cn: 在那之前玛丽恩刚来看过我, 可以说有优先要求权.

sentences.en: Marion has just telephoned me from the phone box downstairs.
sentences.cn: 玛丽恩刚才从楼下电话亭打电话给我了.
马里恩的职业是新闻工作者.

sentences.en: Marion: You look slimmer than when I saw you last.
sentences.cn: 玛丽恩: 你看来比我们上次见面时苗条了.

sentences.en: Michael Manfredi and Marion Gail Weiss designed the women's memorial.
sentences.cn: 由迈克尔?曼弗雷迪和马里恩?魏斯设计.

sentences.en: Mr. Miles was discussing with Marion Clark the draft agreement with Global Engineering.
sentences.cn: 迈尔斯先生在和玛丽恩?克拉克讨论迪斯克公司和环球公司的那份协议草案.

sentences.en: My sister named her son Marion , after a favourite aunt.
sentences.cn: 我姐姐给她的儿子取名玛丽安, 随她最喜欢的一位姨妈的名字.

sentences.en: The Lakers would be a nice fit for Marion.
sentences.cn: 湖人对于马力来说是非常适合的.
